channel.title: Hugo on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Notes to future me
item.description: I haven’t updated this site in years, remind me: Make a new post: hugo new post/pauls-notes.md Update the posts metadata such as whether a draft and add tags Run local server and include draft posts: hugo server -D then kill local server with Ctrl-C Build site to github pages submodule: remember you previously setup the submodule using these instructions. Deploy Site:
